typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_master as string,
		Fund_master_name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_master,
		Fund_master_name,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string,
		Fund_master_Name as string,
		Fund_ABN as string,
		Fund_ARSN as string,
		Fund_Country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Fund_Name,
		Fund_Master = Fund_master,
		Fund_master_Name = Fund_master_name,
		Fund_ABN,
		Fund_ARSN,
		Fund_Country = Fund_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingDB
